title: Education Assessment Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of assessments and evaluation instruments in education.

terms.label: Exam
terms.definition: A formal, typically high-stakes assessment such as a midterm or final exam administered under controlled conditions.

terms.label: Quiz
terms.definition: A shorter or lower-stakes assessment used to check understanding of specific topics or units.

terms.label: Assignment
terms.definition: A task such as homework, problem set, essay, or coding exercise submitted by learners for evaluation.

terms.label: Project or Portfolio
terms.definition: A project, capstone, or portfolio-based assessment that synthesizes learning across multiple topics or courses.

terms.label: Performance or Practical Assessment
terms.definition: A performance, lab practical, demonstration, or other hands-on assessment of applied skills.

terms.label: Standardized Test
terms.definition: An externally defined and administered standardized test or exam used across multiple institutions or jurisdictions.

terms.label: Other Assessment Type
terms.definition: An assessment type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but is needed to represent source systems.
